column1: Baby Barnaby's////This man and the other one
column2: both didn't even offer a refund or apologize at all
column3: basically wanting to get away from us. I sat there for a while debating whether I should yell at this man and ask for our money back
column4: but my friend was too mad and said to just leave. We both were amazed of how the server didn't even care of how
column6: the customers felt about the whole situation.
